sentence in indonesian using the words: Suhu di luar sangat tinggi hari ini.
english translation: The temperature outside is very high today.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Badai besar sedang mendekati pantai.
english translation: A big storm is approaching the coast.

english translation: The dog is digging a hole in the garden.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kami akan berlayar menyeberangi samudra itu.
english translation: We will sail across the ocean.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Apakah kamu tahu suhu tubuhmu sekarang?
english translation: Do you know your body temperature now?

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia pernah menjelajahi padang pasir Sahara.
english translation: He once explored the Sahara desert.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Komunikasi yang baik sangat penting dalam hubungan.
english translation: Good communication is essential in a relationship.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Pers dilarang masuk ke konferensi tersebut.
english translation: The press is prohibited from entering the conference.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Anjing itu mengeluarkan suara yang aneh.
english translation: The dog made a strange sound.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Massa benda itu sangat besar.
english translation: The mass of that object is very large.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia mulai menge-teriak ketika melihat laba-laba di dinding.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya akan merekam pidato mereka secara diam-diam.
english translation: I will secretly record their speeches.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia memilih untuk diam sepanjang pertemuan tersebut.
english translation: He chose to remain silent throughout the meeting.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong jelaskan arti kata tersebut.
english translation: Please explain the meaning of that word.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Pemberitahuan penting akan diberikan besok.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Debat antara dua politisi itu sangat seru.
english translation: The debate between the two politicians was very exciting.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia memiliki argumen yang kuat untuk pendapatnya.
english translation: He has a strong argument for his opinion.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Buku ini memiliki judul yang menarik.
english translation: This book has an interesting title.
